      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void OthelloBoard.flipDiagDirections(BoardPosition startingPos) 
      void IOthelloBoard.flipDiagDirections(BoardPosition startingPos)
      Flips tokens diagonally in all four diagonal directions.
      void OthelloBoard.flipHoriDirections(BoardPosition startingPos) 
      void IOthelloBoard.flipHoriDirections(BoardPosition startingPos)
      Flips tokens horizontally (left and right) starting from the placed token.
      void OthelloBoard.flipVertDirections(BoardPosition startingPos) 
      void IOthelloBoard.flipVertDirections(BoardPosition startingPos)
      Flips tokens vertically (up and down) starting from the placed token.
      void OthelloBoard.forcePlace(char p, BoardPosition pos) 
      void IOthelloBoard.forcePlace(char p, BoardPosition pos)
      Forcefully places a token at a position without flipping any tokens (used for setup/testing).
      boolean OthelloBoard.isPlayerAtPos(BoardPosition pos, char player) 
      boolean IOthelloBoard.isPlayerAtPos(BoardPosition pos, char player)
      Checks if a player occupies the specified board position.
      boolean OthelloBoard.isPositionValid(BoardPosition pos) 
      boolean IOthelloBoard.isPositionValid(BoardPosition pos)
      Checks if a position on the board is empty and valid to place a token.
      void OthelloBoard.placeToken(char p, BoardPosition pos) 
      void IOthelloBoard.placeToken(char p, BoardPosition pos)
      Places a player's token at the specified position and flips the opponent's tokens accordingly.
      char OthelloBoard.whatsAtPos(BoardPosition pos) 
      char IOthelloBoard.whatsAtPos(BoardPosition pos)
      Returns the character at a given position on the board.
